part.title: Document purpose
part.para: This document describes design of PDFedit program intended for PDF documents manipulation. It doesn't bring precise code or classes description and rather provides with ideas and general information to understand implementation. If somebody wants to follow in implementation or understand current state he/she should start with this document and then follow with automatically generated programming documentation.
